name: 6 Sided Elements
description:
Play as a die with elemental powers. Roll around and protect yourself from the evil winged checker pieces. Whichever side of the die is facing up is the power you use. There are 4 powers, Fire, Water, Lightning and Healing. Try to survive as long as you can!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Left Click: Shoot

Point mouse at enemies to aim.

Art:

All made for this jam in Aseprite with the Pear36 palette

Music:

Cake Town - Cute/Playful by Matthew Pablo: https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful

Skeleton Waltz Theme by Wolfgang: https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-waltz-theme

Bossa Nova by Joth https://opengameart.org/content/bossa-nova

Sound Effects:

All generated using Chiptone

Fonts:

Pixellari: https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font

All Software Used:

Unity: Game Engine

Visual Studio Code: Code editor

Aseprite: Art

Chiptone: Sound effects

Audacity: Audio Editing

Ironically the game that I had the least amount of time to work on was my best one yet. Probably because I either got better or procrastinated less.
